posts.post_content:
Looking to buy, thinking about a back run.
Raw, Slabbed. Doesn't matter

Shoot me texts or emails 810-280-0059 / [url]Derekalonzi@gmail.com[/url]

You would need this for a T205 back run of Brown...and it's a pretty tough one to find.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210326/86d092b0a8370a425b17999a54829f76.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210326/158369f3ed94b4ec8479c2a17b6f89d3.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk

Been watching and waiting VERY patiently for the last 10 years to add either the T205 Brown Drum or Broadleaf to complete my back run.  No luck.

Have to have MANY other projects to work on in the interim, as that run is a super tough one.

Dave

[quote name="Harford20" post=2085933]Been watching and waiting VERY patiently for the last 10 years to add either the T205 Brown Drum or Broadleaf to complete my back run.  No luck.



Have to have MANY other projects to work on in the interim, as that run is a super tough one.



Dave[/QUOTE]I agree that is a very tough back run...I bought the Brown Drum back many years ago not to complete a T205 Brown back run but to complete my T205 Hall of Famer run with an example of all 11 tobacco brand backs...I don't know of anyone else that has one since I believe the only Hindu back of a Hall of Famer known is Hugh Duffy and as far as I know I have the only Hindu back Hugh Duffy known.

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk

I seem to recall seeing a Hindu back of a T205 Walter Johnson, but can't verify that with my list.  Am I wrong on this one?
Dave

[quote name="Harford20" post=2085967]I seem to recall seeing a Hindu back of a T205 Walter Johnson, but can't verify that with my list.  Am I wrong on this one?
Dave[/QUOTE]

You're correct...[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball-cards/singles-pre-1930-/1911-t205-hindu-walter-johnson-sgc-30-good-2-one-of-a-kind-/a/7116-79389.s[/url]

Derek, sorry to hijack your thread.

For your T205 Brown wants, would you consider trimmed cards?  
Dave

[quote name="orioles70" post=2085919]You would need this for a T205 back run of Brown...and it's a pretty tough one to find.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210326/86d092b0a8370a425b17999a54829f76.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20210326/158369f3ed94b4ec8479c2a17b6f89d3.jpg[/IMG]

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

Let me wipe the drool off my iPad

[quote name="kmac32" post=2085989]Let me wipe the drool off my iPad[/QUOTE]

Mr. FancyPants wipes drool from his Ipad and not his chin :):):)

Is an amazing card. Derek, there is a Drum on Ebay- just...a lot

[quote name="ahumes13" post=2086073]Mr. FancyPants wipes drool from his Ipad and not his chin :):):)

Is an amazing card. Derek, there is a Drum on Ebay- just...a lot[/QUOTE]

It came from my chin onto my iPad.  LOL

[quote name="kmac32" post=2086089]It came from my chin onto my iPad.  LOL[/QUOTE]

Ha!

Thanks for the correction on the Hindu...I was somehow thinking the Johnson was a Drum and not a Hindu...the only Hall of Famer confirmed to date with a Drum back is Brown (Huggins and Wheat are thought to exist but not confirmed)...so I believe it is possible for someone else other than myself to have a T205 Hall of Famer back run represented on back by an example of the 11 different tobacco brands but they would have to have a Johnson Hindu back and a Brown Drum back to go with a Hall of Famer of the other 9 backs as the only other confirmed Hall of Famer with a Drum or Hindu back is the Duffy Hindu which I have.

Sent from my SM-N950U using Tapatalk
